data.text: @Ptbohealth Your tweet was quoted in an article by globalwinnipeg https://t.co/lampauaaWm

@patchcollecter Hi Rodney, Businesses and organizations may choose to implement their own proof of vaccination policies or requirements after March 1, 2022 if they would like.  
https://t.co/vZ72L5qMTz

@Ptbohealth Please publish the risk benefit analysis for using the experimental covid vaccine on a 5 year old. Prove to me that the vaccines are a benefit and not a risk. If you can't do that you should stop putting our children in harm's way.
@Ptbohealth is it harassment if business still ask for proof of vaccine still when its dropped as of today?
